scripts.deploy: set -x; rsync -avzc --rsync-path='sudo rsync' --delete --usermap="*:$npm_package_config_deploy_user" --groupmap="*:$npm_package_config_deploy_group" --exclude=build.txt --exclude=.* build/out/ "${npm_package_config_deploy_to:?Please define the '$npm_package_name:deploy_to' npm config parameter}"
